name: Smart India Hackathon
description:
Smart India Hackathon 2022 was a nationwide hackathon by the India Government. Developed an end-to-end crowd sourcing platform for creating large question banks. 
 Placed in the Top 5 teams for the Problem Statement ID RK783 out of the 50+ teams.

name: WCE Hackathon
description:
WCE Hackathon was organised by Walchand College of Engineering, Sangli and WCE ACM Student Chapter. Developed a mobile app, admin dashboard, recycler's dashboard, the machine learning model and the related backend microservices in the span of 4 days as a part of the hackathon. 
 Won the hackathon out of the 100+ teams
